title: My Eyes Saw You: Samatha and Colton
description: Colton Rowe's father owns a chain of bars down south. Louisiana matter of fact. he sent his son in his place to manage his business in his absence. Colton was only supposed to be there for a year. That was the deal. That was until he laid eyes on Samantha Quartz. A beautiful young sassy woman that won't give him the time of day because he's her boss. But Colton doesn't take no for an answer.   Samantha has one thing on her mine and it's not the sexy new neighbor across from her building. No, Her job is her first priority. She doesn't have time for guys, much less her extremely handsome boss. One business dinner changes all that. She can't keep telling Colton no any longer. Nor does she want too. He makes her almost forget her neighbor. Almost.
author: Jordan Leger
